title: Aarya Diamond Stud Earrings - Exquisite Floral Vaagai
materials: 7.78g net wt). Featuring brilliant-cut diamonds with VS clarity. Secure post and nut closure.
features: Delicate floral design meticulously handcrafted with a central cluster of diamonds surrounded by radiating petals. The 'vaagai' or flower-inspired motif is a classic South Indian design element. The openwork setting enhances the brilliance of the diamonds. Modern take on the traditional studs, creating a perfect blend of timeless elegance and contemporary style.
colors: Predominantly yellow gold with dazzling white diamonds
creating a timeless and sophisticated aesthetic.
occasions: Ideal for everyday elegance or special occasions such as weddings
or festivals. A beautiful accessory for the modern woman who appreciates traditional design with a contemporary twist. Perfect as a gift for engagements
description: These diamond stud earrings are a statement of understated luxury and timeless elegance. The floral 'vaagai' design holds cultural significance, making them a cherished heirloom. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail and using only the finest materials, they are a testament to the unparalleled craftsmanship of Hyderabad's jewelry artisans. The secure setting ensures durability and lasting brilliance. The perfect way to add a touch of South Indian heritage to your everyday style.
